mapper.insert: insert into public.geohazard_computation_job (dsl_id, name, status, current_line, deleted, create_by, modify_by) values (#{dslId}, #{name}, #{status}, #{currentLine}, false, #{createBy}, #{modifyBy})
mapper.update: update public.geohazard_computation_job set current_line = #{currentLine}, status = 'proceeding' where id = #{jobId};
update public.geohazard_computation_job set result_raster_id = #{savedRasterId}, status = 'complete' where id = #{jobId};
